trans-unit.source: Describes the type of SQL command used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> controls when performing a database operation.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the type of SQL command contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> properties.
The Text value indicates that the text is a SQL query or command string while the StoredProcedure value indicates that the text is the name of a stored procedure.
The text contained in a corresponding text property is the name of a stored procedure.
The text contained in a corresponding text property is a SQL query or command.
